p: As shown in Figure 4, the PC group showed the lowest ACI value (62). The RN-medicated groups 1, 2, and 3 showed inactive, slight, and intermediate anti-coccidial impacts, with ACI indexes of 117, 125, and 143, respectively, and the ACI index of the infected group supplemented with Sacox reached 143, indicating an intermediate anti-coccidial effect. The PC group exhibited a higher ACI value (200) than the infected group supplemented with Sacox.
